item.title: Google Just Murdered 99Satoshis...(Bitcoin Faucet Update)
item.description:
Google Just Murdered 99Satoshis...(Bitcoin Faucet Update)

Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Share on LinkedIn+It is with a sad heart that I declare the premature death of 99Satoshis who was only 2 weeks old. 99Satoshis died from a Google Adsense ban on May 13th 2016. May he rest in peace...

item.title: London Workshop Explores Benefits and Challenges of Blockchain for Identity - CoinDesk
item.description:
London Workshop Explores Benefits and Challenges of Blockchain for Identity - CoinDesk

The Identity & KYC conference in London hosted a workshop on using blockchain technology to improve know-your-customer processes earlier this week. Led by blockchain compliance consultant Si√¢n Jones, the workshop was attended by a group drawn from banks, financial institutions, startups and regulators.

item.title: BitLicense Has Done More Good Than Bad to the Bitcoin Sector - NEWSBTC
item.description:
BitLicense Has Done More Good Than Bad to the Bitcoin Sector - NEWSBTC

BitLicense, introduced in the New York state did more harm than good to the digital currency technology industry. Other governments intend to avoid making the same mistakes. Read more... When BitLicense was introduced, it was hailed as a defining moment, where the government-less and regulation-less cryptocurrency platforms meet regulatory machinery set up by governments and centralized organizations.

item.title: How do I set up a news publication on Ethereum?
item.description:
How do I set up a news publication on Ethereum?

I was thinking of creating a news outlet and was wondering if anyone knew how to set up a website on Ethereum. I hear it'd be a smart place to set up a publication but I have no clue how to code.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Rockets Past $500; Ethereum Slump Imminent?
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Rockets Past $500; Ethereum Slump Imminent?

Bitcoin price has surged past the $500 mark for the first time in 2016. The increased interest in bitcoin trading has exhibited a negative impact on ether prices. Read more... Whoa! Did you see that? Bitcoin price has suddenly surged to reach the $500 mark.

item.title: Recap of The First 24 Hours of Trading The DAO Token
item.description:
Recap of The First 24 Hours of Trading The DAO Token

Now that people can trade The DAO tokens, various exchanges are trying to compete for the top spot. Poloniex remains the clear market leader, and Kraken is taking a bigger lead over Bittrex than yesterday. These are still the very early days of trading this token, though, and things may very well change over the next few weeks.

item.title: Surging Bitcoin Price Is Appealing To Chinese Depositors
item.description:
Surging Bitcoin Price Is Appealing To Chinese Depositors

It has been a pretty stellar weekend for Bitcoin enthusiasts all over the world so far, as the price keeps going up and there is no end in sight. Albeit some resistance has been made at an earlier peak, the Chinese market keeps driving the demand for Bitcoin to new heights.

item.title: Tierion Launches API to Anchor Data in Bitcoin Blockchain - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Tierion Launches API to Anchor Data in Bitcoin Blockchain - NEWSBTC

Tierion has announced the launch of its latest API last week. The new high-performance API can be used to anchor data in the blockchain. Read more... The Hartford, Connecticut-based blockchain company, Tierion has announced the launch of its latest API last week.
